title: Find the Githyanki Creche

Sit in the githyanki purification device

Ghustil Storngoss, the doctor, is dead. There might still be a way to operate the githyanki purification device. Vlaakith and Inquisitor W'wargaz tried to kill us. There might still be a chance that using the githyanki purification device will remove our parasites.

Quest Complete Descr
